title: Calories in a Garlic Bread
meta_description: Discover calories in a garlic bread slice, including carbs, fat, protein, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: One standard slice (~50g) of garlic bread made with white bread, butter, garlic, and herbs; baked, no added cheese.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, slice size, butter amount, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of garlic bread provides ~150 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp mozzarella cheese per slice
Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of garlic bread?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal per standard slice under typical assumptions.

faqs.q: Is garlic bread high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, around 20g carbs per slice, mainly from the bread.

faqs.q: What makes garlic bread high in sodium?
faqs.a: Butter, garlic seasoning, and sometimes added salt contribute ~250mg per slice.

faqs.q: Can I make garlic bread lower in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, use less butter or olive oil spread; this can reduce fat by 3-4g per slice.

faqs.q: How does baking vs. toasting affect calories in garlic bread?
faqs.a: Baking adds minimal calories; toasting may dry it out slightly, but values are similar.
